item.description: De Wafelbakkers Frozen Buttermilk Pancakes, 18 Count Pack
item.romanceDescription:
When your family wants a delicious meal at breakfast time, reach for De Wafelbakkers Buttermilk Pancakes. Premade, frozen pancakes are ready to warm so you can enjoy the delicious taste and fluffy texture of buttermilk pancakes without the mess. Made with quality ingredients, these pancakes are a great choice for family dinner or breakfast. To prepare, simply warm the desired number of pancakes in the oven or microwave according to the time on the pack. Enjoy the classic taste of buttermilk pancakes, ready to eat in seconds. Top the warm pancakes with pancake syrup, or add whipped cream and your favorite fruit for an extra special frozen breakfast food. You can even use these as fun frozen family meals by making pancake creations like breakfast sandwiches or pancake tacos. This 18 count pack of De Wafelbakkers Buttermilk Pancakes has plenty of pancakes for many breakfasts or family dinners. Homemade taste in just 60 seconds – De Wafelbakkers Frozen Pancakes has been providing families with great mornings for over 30 years. Attack the Stack!

  • One 18 count pack of De Wafelbakkers Buttermilk Pancakes
  • Premade, frozen pancakes with a hearty texture and classic buttermilk flavor
  • This pack of pancakes is great for easy breakfasts, snacks and family dinners
  • Simply microwave for warm and fluffy pancakes that are ready to eat in seconds
  • Perfect for frozen meals for a quick breakfast or to enjoy later in the day as a snack, dessert or dinner meal
  • De Wafelbakkers Frozen Pancakes has been providing families with great mornings for over 30 years
  • De Wafelbakkers Pancakes are a made with quality ingredients to help you power through the day
